title: (x) Balenciaga Logo Font ? / wide grotesque - probably custom, similar to Blair, Engravers Gothic, Sackers {Marc O, Riccardo}
content:
[http://fashionista.com/\_old/2010/02/08/balenciaga%20fragrance.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112043408/http:/fashionista.com/_old/2010/02/08/balenciaga%20fragrance.jpg "http://fashionista.com/\_old/2010/02/08/balenciaga%20fragrance.jpg")

What is the font used for Balenciaga's Logo? I really like the sleek aesthetic. Thanks for any help!
author: A-Kortaberria

comments.content: Not an exact match, but try ITC Blair, Engravers Gothic or Trade Gothic Extended.
